item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, tonight we are going out and seeing a great show at the "Players Ring"  "BODY" is the story of three young men , societal misfits, who discover that the dead body of the legendary actress Marilyn Monroe lies in the autopsy room next to their "hangout" in the basement of a morgue in LA,"" ***Before the show starts we will be meeting at "The Coat of Arms" for dinner and making new friends, we will meet at 6 pm I will try to get there by 5:45 to reserve a table., when you reserve with this meetup site just let me know if you are coming to dinner.**** Join us after the show as we will walk to some local pubs and enjoy the ambiance of the nightlife there!!!! When you reserve just mention that you are with "Trailblazers" to receive your discount. Call the Players Ring at: 603-436-8123 to rsvp, you pay at the door or you can buy your tickets online. Please make your own reservations as these show do sell out quickly as they are very popular. Make sure you arrive at the theater by 7:30 as the show starts promptly at 8pm. Body by David Mauriello

BODY was the first original play presented by the RING in it's premier season 1992-1993. BODY opened in January of 1993, was reprised 5 years later and has now been chosen as part of the ENCORE series for the Ring's 20th anniversay celebration.

BODY the story of three young men , societal misfits, who discover that the dead body of the legendary actress Marilyn Monroe lies in the autopsy room next to their "hangout" in the basement of a morgue in LA, offers challenging acting roles for three men and one woman. BODY will be directed by Richard DiMario who has directed several shows at the RING including THE GOAT and AMERICAN BUFFALO as well as Mauriello's A PASSAGE OF TIME.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: The "Body" @ The Players Ring
